item.title: Bridging the Gap~March 5th, 2019: International Women's Day
item.description: Paige Okamura celebrates International Women's Day with a selection of Soul, Hawaiian, World and Reggae.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura celebrates International Women's Day with a selection of Soul, Hawaiian, World and Reggae.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~March 4th, 2019: Mardi Gras
item.description: Celebrating Fat Tuesday and Mardi Gras in this Bridging the Gap with a variety of music from the Big Easy. Expect 2nd Line brass, Mardi Gras Indians and a little Zydeco.
item.itunes:summary: Celebrating Fat Tuesday and Mardi Gras in this Bridging the Gap with a variety of music from the Big Easy. Expect 2nd Line brass, Mardi Gras Indians and a little Zydeco.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~March 1st, 2019: The Crash
item.description: So my computer crashed right before going into this show. So I scrapped my plans, and played older CDs. It still turned out to be a pretty good show, and can be found below.
item.itunes:summary: So my computer crashed right before going into this show. So I scrapped my plans, and played older CDs. It still turned out to be a pretty good show, and can be found below.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 28th, 2019: Indie Rock Excursion
item.description: HPR's newest DJ- Harrison Patiño stretches his legs with two hours of indie rock for this session of Bridging the Gap.
item.itunes:summary: HPR's newest DJ- Harrison Patiño stretches his legs with two hours of indie rock for this session of Bridging the Gap.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 27th, 2019: Soul, Funk & Brass
item.description: Celebrating the life of the late Jackie Shane, and exploring all sorts of soul, funk and brass driven music in this session of Bridging the Gap.
item.itunes:summary: Celebrating the life of the late Jackie Shane, and exploring all sorts of soul, funk and brass driven music in this session of Bridging the Gap.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 26th, 2019: Covers!
item.description: Paige Okamura takes the reigns this evening on Bridging the Gap for an evening of cover songs.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura takes the reigns this evening on Bridging the Gap for an evening of cover songs.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 25th, 2019: Chilled and Soulful
item.description: Mellow, soulful, and warm sounds dominate this sessin of Bridging the Gap
item.itunes:summary: Mellow, soulful, and warm sounds dominate this sessin of Bridging the Gap

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 22nd, 2019: Introducing...
item.description: Happy Friday to you! If you're a regular listener to Bridging the Gap, you've noticed a few new voices on the air. We're adding two new DJs to the late night airwaves. Paige Okamura, better known as DJ Mermaid from KTUH will be taking over Tuesday nights, and tonight I'm introducing Harrison Patiño (also from KTUH). He'll eventually be taking over Thursday evenings... but for now is just taking over the second hour of the show. Tonight he's pulling out some Americana.
item.itunes:summary: Happy Friday to you! If you're a regular listener to Bridging the Gap, you've noticed a few new voices on the air. We're adding two new DJs to the late night airwaves. Paige Okamura, better known as DJ Mermaid from KTUH will be taking over Tuesday nights, and tonight I'm introducing Harrison Patiño (also from KTUH). He'll eventually be taking over Thursday evenings... but for now is just taking over the second hour of the show. Tonight he's pulling out some Americana.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 21st, 2019: Fun Music for Good Times
item.description: Keeping the music fun and filled with a lot of rock and blues ahead of my set this weekend at the CRAFT Brewers Festival.
item.itunes:summary: Keeping the music fun and filled with a lot of rock and blues ahead of my set this weekend at the CRAFT Brewers Festival.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 20th, 2019: New Music
item.description: Exploring new music and new releases tonight on Bridging the Gap. Expect to hear from Panda Bear, The Budos Band, Y La Bamba, Jenny Lewis (pictured), and more.
item.itunes:summary: Exploring new music and new releases tonight on Bridging the Gap. Expect to hear from Panda Bear, The Budos Band, Y La Bamba, Jenny Lewis (pictured), and more.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 19th, 2019: Post Valentines
item.description: Paige Okamura pulls heart-strings with a post Valentine's Day selection of Bridging the Gap.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura pulls heart-strings with a post Valentine's Day selection of Bridging the Gap.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 18th, 2019: Mellow, Jazzy & Soulful
item.description: Keeping the music mellow and cool for this session of Bridging the Gap. Expect bits of beautiful Jazz, Soul, and Downtempo.
item.itunes:summary: Keeping the music mellow and cool for this session of Bridging the Gap. Expect bits of beautiful Jazz, Soul, and Downtempo.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 15th, 2019: Mixed Live
item.description: Since this was the week of radio firsts and experimentation... I'm taking it one step further and doing this session of Bridging the Gap on DJ gear. So all the songs will be mixed together... it's the closest you'd get to a live set in a nightclub.
item.itunes:summary: Since this was the week of radio firsts and experimentation... I'm taking it one step further and doing this session of Bridging the Gap on DJ gear. So all the songs will be mixed together... it's the closest you'd get to a live set in a nightclub.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 14th, 2019: Valentines Day LIVE!
item.description: Happy Valentine's Day! We taped this show last night in front of a live audience at HPR Gen Listen's Speakeasy.
item.itunes:summary: Happy Valentine's Day! We taped this show last night in front of a live audience at HPR Gen Listen's Speakeasy.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 13th, 2019: New Sounds
item.description: Digging through new music with you on this session of Bridging the Gap.
item.itunes:summary: Digging through new music with you on this session of Bridging the Gap.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 12th, 2019: Fun Beats for Chilly Nights
item.description: Paige Okamura guest hosts this session of Bridging the Gap, mixing in cool beats for these chilly nights. Bits of downtempo mix into mellow neo-soul and hip-hop.
item.itunes:summary: Paige Okamura guest hosts this session of Bridging the Gap, mixing in cool beats for these chilly nights. Bits of downtempo mix into mellow neo-soul and hip-hop.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 11th, 2019: Warm Sounds for Chilly Nights
item.description: It's chilly in the islands (by Hawaii standards). So the music for this session of Bridging the Gap is going to be filled with warm sounds to cuddle up to.
item.itunes:summary: It's chilly in the islands (by Hawaii standards). So the music for this session of Bridging the Gap is going to be filled with warm sounds to cuddle up to.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 8th, 2019: The Friday Swerve
item.description: Keeping the music light and fun for this Friday evening session of Bridging the Gap. A little bossa, latin, disco, hip-hop and acid jazz... and back again.
item.itunes:summary: Keeping the music light and fun for this Friday evening session of Bridging the Gap. A little bossa, latin, disco, hip-hop and acid jazz... and back again.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 7th, 2019: International Clash Day & J Dilla
item.description: Celebrating International Clash Day with a number of other public Radio stations. International Clash Day is an all day long, all across the globe, celebrating music as a tool for social consciousness, and the 40th anniversary of the Clash’s London Calling. It’s anti-racist, and anti-fear, pro-solidarity, pro-unity, and pro-inclusion kind of day and kind of setlist for this session of Bridging the Gap. I'm also working in some of the music from J Dilla who would have been 39 today.
item.itunes:summary: Celebrating International Clash Day with a number of other public Radio stations. International Clash Day is an all day long, all across the globe, celebrating music as a tool for social consciousness, and the 40th anniversary of the Clash’s London Calling. It’s anti-racist, and anti-fear, pro-solidarity, pro-unity, and pro-inclusion kind of day and kind of setlist for this session of Bridging the Gap. I'm also working in some of the music from J Dilla who would have been 39 today.

item.title: Bridging the Gap~February 6th, 2019: Indie Rock & a little World
item.description: Switching back and forth between indie rock and world music for this session of Bridging the Gap. Working in new music from The Specials, Dexter Story, Y La Bamba, Beck and more.
item.itunes:summary: Switching back and forth between indie rock and world music for this session of Bridging the Gap. Working in new music from The Specials, Dexter Story, Y La Bamba, Beck and more.
